danish_publication: Norden for Vilslev har der i et hus været spøgeri. Hver aften kom en seks, syv kalve, og folkene kunde ikke være der for dem. Så hentede de pastor Clausen i Nörre-Fardrup, og så blev der ro. A har kjendt karlen, der kjørte for ham. Der vilde komme nogen og tage i tömmen og tage det ene hjul af, men han kerte sig ikke derom. Så kom præsten og sagde: "Kjør nu i Jesu navn . . ."
english_publication: There was haunting in a house north of Vislev. Every night, six or seven calves came and the people couldn't be there because of them. Then they got pastor Clausen from Nørre-Fardrup, and then they got peace. I knew the farmhand who drove for him. Someone would come and grab hold of the reins and take one of the wheels off, but he paid no attention to that. Then the minister came and said, "Drive now in the name of Jesus..."
